data.title: French Song: Si jamais j'oublie (+ Multimedia Resources)
data.meta_description: FEEL GOOD ABOUT SEEING YOUR STUDENTS LEARNING BY SINGING & HAVING FUN IN THE WORLD LANGUAGE THEY ARE LEARNING! THEY WILL ENHANCE THEIR VOCABULARY, COMMUNICATION, COMPREHENSION SKILLS, AND CULTURAL & GEOGRAPHICAL COMPETENCE, THROUGH SINGING SONGS! SAVE TIME, CREATE FUN, ENGAGE STUDENTS, AND F...
data.text:
FEEL GOOD ABOUT SEEING YOUR STUDENTS LEARNING BY SINGING & HAVING FUN IN THE WORLD LANGUAGE THEY ARE LEARNING! THEY WILL ENHANCE THEIR VOCABULARY, COMMUNICATION, COMPREHENSION SKILLS, AND CULTURAL & GEOGRAPHICAL COMPETENCE, THROUGH SINGING SONGS! SAVE TIME, CREATE FUN, ENGAGE STUDENTS, AND FEEL GOOD!

Look at the research and the video of a classroom singing experience:

• The Research: https://www.songsforteaching.com/references.htm

• Videos of Classroom Example: https://bit.ly/singing2learnlanguages & www.celebratelanguages.com/music.html

This is a lyrics song sheet of the very beautiful and popular French song “Si j’amais j’oublie.” (See a group of my students singing it here.) It is for teachers teaching, and students learning French through music/singing in the French classroom. This One-Page Song Lyrics Sheet is a Multi-Featured, Multimedia, Mobile-Device-Ready (“Triple M”) Lyrics Sheet, Unlike Any Other You’ll Find Elsewhere! All on-page linked features are ready-to-use and require no accounts creation. This one-page song lyrics sheet includes the following features:

• Geography: map of the song’s country of origin, with a French description of its location || Link: short URL to a GeoVideo of the song’s country of origin.

• Artist’s Bio: a photo and brief introductory biography of the song’s artist(s) || Link: short URL to the artist(s)’ personal homepage (or fans page)

• Lyrics: complete, clear and accurate lyrics of the featured song, in an easy learnable format. || Link: short URL to a lyrics, and a karaoke video of the song

• Glossary: a list of French vocab & expressions from the lyrics, with translations into English. || Link: shortened URL to digital audiovisual flashcards of the vocab from the lyrics.

• Quizlet-Enabled: QR-code access to Quizlet audiovisual vocab flashcards.

• Video-Ready: QR-code access to watch the music video anytime/anywhere.

• Kahoot-Ready: short, customized URL to Kahoot with the lyrics' keywords.

• Coin Culturel (Cultural Corner): featuring a cultural product, practice, or perspective

Please note: The digital download is a PDF download in which each URL is clickable, and each QR code is scannable, while still on your computer, tablet, or on any other mobile device. Once downloaded, the file may be printed for student distribution and use.

Please follow me . . . for the following upcoming song lyrics sheets that are currently in production. There are many more songs to come. Is there a lyrics sheet of a particular song you would like to have? Request it at: rwdemeij@gmail.com and it will be created for you.

FRENCH: On Ecrit Sur Les Murs • Mama Africa • Tout Ce Qui Brille • Ne Partez Pas Sans Moi • Au Clair de la Lune • L’oiseau et L’enfant • Pour un Flirt • La Ballade Des Gens Heureux • Je Suis une Pizza • J’aime la Galette • La Vie En Rose • Il Pleut, Il Pleut, Bèrgère • Sur Le Pont D’Avignon • Ma Famille • Un Grand Cerf Dans La Forêt • Une Sourit Verte • Il Était Un Petit Navire • Promenons-Nous Dans Les Bois • La Fourmi M’a Piqué La Main ||

SPANISH: Cielito Lindo • Un Millón de Cosas • La Bamba • Waka Waka • Guantanamera • Las Mañanitas • Lago Azul • Eres Tú • Danza Kuduro • Sopa de Caracol • Pacto de Amor • Ojalá Que Llueva Café • Caminando • La Vaca Lola • A Mi Burro Le Duele La Cabeza • Susanita Tiene un Ratón • Arroz Con Leche • Una Rate Vieja • Tengo Una Muñeca Vestida de Azul • Pin Pon Es un Muñeco • Dicen Que . . . • Caballito Blanco • El Barquito Chiquitito • Los Pollitos Dicen • El Negro Cirilo • En un Bosque de la China • La Gozadera ||

GERMAN: O du lieber Augustin • Backe, backe Kuchen • Meine Oma fährt im Hühnerstall Motorrad • Drei Chinesen mit dem Kontrabass • Auf der Mauer, auf der Lauer • Fünf kleine Fische • Sankt Martin • Das ist gerade, das ist schief • Meine Hände sind verschwunden • Es war eine Mutter • Es regnet, es regnet • Morgens früh um sechs • Liebe, liebe Sonne • Kommt ein Vogel geflogen • Kopf und Schultern, Knie und Fuß • Weißt Du, wieviel Sternlein stehen • Wer hat die schönsten Schäfchen • Ein Schneider fing 'ne Maus ||
